squared.game

Class HighscoreMenager

  • java.lang.Object
    • squared.game.HighscoreMenager

  • public class HighscoreMenager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is used to handle all actions connected with highscores. Mainly used to reset scores, update or load score file.
    Author:
    bartl_000

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String FILE
      Name of the file where scores are.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Score> highscores
      Array list holding scores from File.
      private java.io.ObjectInputStream inputStream
      Stream to which data from file is saved.
      private java.io.ObjectOutputStream outputStream
      Stream using which date is saved to file.
      private static int SCORESAMOUNT
      Maximal amount of scores.

    • Constructor Summary

      HighscoreMenager()
      Constructor which set highscores to a new arrayList.

      • resetFile

        public void resetFile()
        Method that removes all scores from file and change them to 0.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - - file with name saved in FILE doesnt exist
        java.io.IOException - - stream was not handled properly
        See Also:
        #remove()

      • loadFile

        private void loadFile()
        Loads file to inputStream.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - - file with name saved in FILE doesnt exist
        java.io.IOException - - stream was not handled properly

      • updateFile

        private void updateFile()
        Loads highscores to outputStream, saves 10 best scores to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - - file with name saved in FILE doesnt exist
        java.io.IOException - - stream was not handled properly

      • getHighscore

        public java.util.ArrayList<Score> getHighscore()
        Getting highscores from file after loading file.
        Returns:
        highscores - containing best actual scores
        See Also:
        loadFile()

      • addHighscore

        public void addHighscore(long score,
                         java.lang.String date)
        Adds new highscore to highscores array. Sorts array.
        Parameters:
        score - - number we want to add
        date - - current date as string
